channel.title: CVE Feed for RedNao -- Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RedNao -- Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations

item.title: CVE-2023-40664|2024-08-02T18:38:51.067Z -- rednao -- donations%20made%20easy%20%E2%80%93%20smart%20donations
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in RedNao Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations plugin <= 4.0.12 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-47551|2024-08-02T21:09:37.408Z -- rednao -- donations%20made%20easy%20%E2%80%93%20smart%20donations
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RedNao Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations.This issue affects Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations: from n/a through 4.0.12.

item.title: CVE-2023-47550|2024-08-02T21:09:37.433Z -- rednao -- donations%20made%20easy%20%E2%80%93%20smart%20donations
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RedNao Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations: from n/a through 4.0.12.

item.title: CVE-2023-32603|2024-08-02T15:25:35.476Z -- rednao -- donations%20made%20easy%20%E2%80%93%20smart%20donations
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in RedNao Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations plugin <= 4.0.12 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-40207|2024-08-02T18:24:55.952Z -- rednao -- donations%20made%20easy%20%E2%80%93%20smart%20donations
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in RedNao Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations: from n/a through 4.0.12.
